message.raw:
Modified the Queue Manager to display a state in the status bar, and to use the new state machine architecture.

In some places it is a bit hacky, but will go through next week and carefully check that everything makes sense and is logical. May need to modify the state machine architecture to handle the queuing of states differently after transitioning to buffered.
